name: SportClips
0:
”Alexa, open Sport Clips”
”Alexa, tell Sport Clips to check in”
”Alexa, ask Sport Clips for the wait time at the store near me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sport clips
des:
Checking in for your haircut has never been easier with the Sport Clips Haircuts skill. Just log in with your Sport Clips account, provide your location and check in.

Use the Sport Clips Haircuts skill to:
• Check in for yourself and/or guests you have saved to your profile
• Save your favorite store and/or Stylist to streamline the check-in process
• Find out if your favorite Stylist is available
• Find the closest Sport Clips location
• Cancel or change your existing check in

To get started, enable the Sport Clips Haircuts skill with Alexa and follow the prompts to get you started. 

“Alexa, open Sport Clips”
“Alexa, ask Sport Clips to check in” 

The Sport Clips Haircuts skill will automatically access your current location only if you provide permission and you are using a compatible device with geolocation services enabled. Otherwise, you will be prompted to provide your zip code in order to determine your location.
